021import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
022import net.tnemc.core.account.PlayerAccount;
023import net.tnemc.core.api.response.AccountAPIResponse;
024import org.spongepowered.api.Sponge;
025import org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.server.ServerPlayer;
026import org.spongepowered.api.service.economy.Currency;
027import org.spongepowered.api.service.economy.EconomyService;
028import org.spongepowered.api.service.economy.account.Account;
029import org.spongepowered.api.service.economy.account.AccountDeletionResultType;
030import org.spongepowered.api.service.economy.account.UniqueAccount;
031import org.spongepowered.api.service.economy.account.VirtualAccount;
032
033import java.util.ArrayList;
034import java.util.Collection;
035import java.util.Optional;
036import java.util.UUID;
037import java.util.stream.Stream;
038
039/**
040 * SpongeEconomy
041 *
042 * @author creatorfromhell
043 * @since 0.1.2.0
044 */
045public class SpongeEconomy implements EconomyService {
046
047  @Override
048  public Currency defaultCurrency() {
049
050    return new SpongeCurrency(TNECore.eco().currency().defaultCurrency());
051  }
052
053  @Override
054  public boolean hasAccount(final UUID identifier) {
055
056    return TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(identifier).isPresent();
057  }
058
059  @Override
060  public boolean hasAccount(final String identifier) {
061
062    return TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(identifier).isPresent();
063  }
064
065  @Override
066  public Optional<UniqueAccount> findOrCreateAccount(final UUID identifier) {
067
068    final Optional<PlayerAccount> account = TNECore.eco().account().findPlayerAccount(identifier);
069    if(account.isEmpty()) {
070
071      final Optional<ServerPlayer> playerProvider = Sponge.server().player(identifier);
072      if(playerProvider.isPresent()) {
073
074        final AccountAPIResponse response = TNECore.eco().account().createAccount(identifier.toString(), playerProvider.get().name());
075        if(response.getResponse().success() && response.getPlayerAccount().isPresent()) {
076          return Optional.of(new SpongeUniqueAccount(response.getPlayerAccount().get()));
077        }
078      }
079      return Optional.empty();
080    }
081    return Optional.of(new SpongeUniqueAccount(account.get()));
082  }
083
084  @Override
085  public Optional<Account> findOrCreateAccount(final String identifier) {
086
087    return Optional.empty();
088  }
089
090  @Override
091  public Stream<UniqueAccount> streamUniqueAccounts() {
092
093    return uniqueAccounts().stream();
094  }
095
096  @Override
097  public Collection<UniqueAccount> uniqueAccounts() {
098
099    return new ArrayList<>();
100  }
101
102  @Override
103  public Stream<VirtualAccount> streamVirtualAccounts() {
104
105    return virtualAccounts().stream();
106  }
107
108  @Override
109  public Collection<VirtualAccount> virtualAccounts() {
110
111    return new ArrayList<>();
112  }
113
114  @Override
115  public AccountDeletionResultType deleteAccount(final UUID identifier) {
116
117    return new SpongeDeletionResult(TNECore.eco().account().deleteAccount(identifier));
118  }
119
120  @Override
121  public AccountDeletionResultType deleteAccount(final String identifier) {
122
123    final Optional<net.tnemc.core.account.Account> account = TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(identifier);
124
125    return new SpongeDeletionResult(TNECore.eco().account().deleteAccount(account.get().getIdentifier()));
126  }
127}
